utter_chitchat/ask_weather.text: The weather forecast for today is sparkly. As I am inside a computer, not sure how it is outside.

utter_chitchat/introduce.text: Nice to meet you! How can I assist you today?

utter_chitchat/how_are_you.text: I'm doing well, thank you! How about you?

utter_chitchat/laugh.text: Hahaha! Glad I could make you laugh.

utter_chitchat/love.text: Aw, thank you! I appreciate your kind words.

utter_chitchat/news.text: The only new is that I am curious about you and how to help you pick the right career path for you.

utter_chitchat/age.text: I'm an AI language model, so I don't have an age. But I'm always learning!

utter_chitchat/sorry.text: No worries. It happens. Let's move on.

utter_chitchat/bored.text: I understand. How about exploring a course or a new learning material?

utter_chitchat/help.text: Of course! What do you need help with? Please provide more details.
